text: Tha Dogg Pound is an American gangsta rap duo. The group was founded in 1992. They were originally signed to the record label Death Row. They made their first appearance on the Dr. Dre album The Chronic. They were also on Snoop Dogg's album Doggystyle. Their first album, Dogg Food came out in 1995. During 1993â€“94, the group assisted MC Hammer on his The Funky Headhunter album along with Suge Knight. ==References== Category:Rap music groups Category:1992 establishments in the United States
title: Tha Dogg Pound
